sections.title: Error Use Case
paragraphs: An exception has been thrown due to the misconfiguration of an OpenActive SDK library or component.

description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It should not change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
name.example: An exception has been thrown due to the misconfiguration of an OpenActive SDK library or component.
name.defaultContent: An exception has been thrown due to the misconfiguration of an OpenActive SDK library or component.

description: An integer representing the HTTP status code.
